translations: n.大蕉（香蕉的一种）；车前草

sentences.sentence: There stood beautiful palm-trees, oaks, and plantains;
sentences.translation: 那儿还有许多美丽的棕榈树、栎树和梧桐树；

sentences.sentence: "Platanos maduros, sweet plantains, " he said when he noticed Simon staring. "Sit. "
sentences.translation: （西班牙语：甜芭蕉），香甜的芭蕉，”他注意到西蒙盯着锅看，对他说，“坐吧。”

sentences.sentence: Mangu is made from mashing boiled plantains with butter and either salami, cheese or eggs.
sentences.translation: Mangu是用捣碎煮沸的大蕉搭配黄油或是意大利蒜味腊肠，奶酪或是鸡蛋共同烹制而成。
